KOM.MC.summary: PlÃ¡sticos Compuestos, S.A. design, production, and marketing of mineral filler concentrates and color concentrates and additives. The company offers minerals concentrates for blown film, blow and injection moulding, raffia and ropes, thermoforming and sheet extrusion, pipes and profiles, and recycling industries under exfill; compostable resins under biokomp brand name; biodegradble in water product under Okean brand name; color masterbatches under kroma brand name; and black and white masterbatch.
